item.headline: Accessing Your Training Environment
item.content:
Your Training Environment

Welcome to the Course Support Training environment. There are three different "Courses" contained within: FDDA 240, FDHUM BB-8, and FDLIT 111. Each course corresponds to the theme of the training program you are currently enrolled in.

Remember that this is your sandbox and you are the only one who will be accessing these trainings. Feel free to mess around with them once you have gone through the training for that level!

If you would like to test an idea or play with the settings on a particular type of assignment, do it! Try out new things or to explore the various settings on different types of assignments. You can even change the settings of items that are already in your sandbox!

item.headline: Halloween Safety Reminder
item.content:
Halloween Safety 10/28/2015

Students,

With the approach of All Hallow's Eve I must urge you all to treat muggles with kindness and respect. Many of them will be parading about neighborhoods purporting to be witches and wizards and demanding sweets. While these portrayals of our kind are offensive and shameful one must not give in to the temptation to use magic outside of a classroom setting. Muggles are, for the most part, still very superstitious and do not understand our ways. It is likely that if they discovered a true-to-life witch or wizard, they would be cruel and unforgiving. 

Practice safety this Halloween by:

  • Staying indoors
  • Keeping magic practice to a minimum
  • Avoiding any act that would draw attention to yourself.

If you must go out on Halloween, the school advises wearing your robes and hat in an attempt to blend in with the muggle crowds.

I will be accepting late work this week as I know the stress and discretion that need to be taken during the holiday season.

-McG
